summary: YouTube is a popular video-sharing website that was created in 2005 and is now owned by Google. With over 2.7 billion monthly users, it is the second most-visited website globally. People upload over 500 hours of video content to YouTube every minute! Google bought YouTube in 2006 and has since expanded it beyond the website, with apps, TV, and links to other platforms. YouTube offers a wide variety of videos, from music and news to movies and TV spots. It has had a significant impact on popular culture and has made some of its users very famous. However, it has also faced criticism for issues like misinformation and privacy violations.
title: YouTube
